faqs.topic: A message "Content Coming Soon" is displayed on my screen and I cannot see any content for the QR code scanned
faqs.description: Your State is currently creating content for this QR code. The delay is because there is a large number of textbooks for many classes, mediums and subjects. You will see the content  as soon as the State has created it.

faqs.topic: I cannot see content for my board, medium, class or subject
faqs.description: Your State has not yet created or added content for your medium, board, class or subject. If you see  books listed in the app library, you will most likely get the content in this academic year.

faqs.topic: I want to get the mobile app on iOS or desktop
faqs.description: You can visit https://www.diksha.gov.in/explore/ using your browser on iOS or desktop devices to view content. We are currently working on a desktop application for offline use that is expected to be ready later this year

faqs.topic: I am unable to see the QR code scan button
faqs.description: This is caused by an outdated version of Android System WebView component on your phone. To update the webview component: 1. Go to Google Playstore 2. Go to the android webview link. Use https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.webview. Note: The Android WebView is a pre-installed component that allows Android apps to display web content. It should be kept up to date to ensure the latest security updates.

faqs.topic: I want to access particular resources by type
faqs.description:
• Click the Resource type tab on the home page
  • Select either Project, Observation, Survey or Course
  • A list of available resources of the selected resource type for your role and location is displayed
  • Click the required resource from the list to use or start it

faqs.topic: I have an Android 4.4 device, I cannot play content on it
faqs.description:
Android version 4.4 does not support html5 and thus all content cannot be played. To play content on a device with Android version 4.4, try the following:
  • Update the Android version to the latest, preferably to a version greater than 5.1
  • Update the {{APP_NAME}} mobile app to the latest version
The app prompts to download and install Crosswalk when playing content on Android 4.4.version. Using Crosswalk enables playing most content on Android 4.4 version

faqs.topic: I want to play content when there is no Internet
faqs.description:
You can download content only when you are connected to the Internet. Only the downloaded content can be played later without the Internet. 
You can play YouTube videos only when you are connected to the Internet because YouTube does not allow other apps to download videos.

faqs.topic: Content takes up a lot of space on my phone
faqs.description: You can delete the downloaded content from the downloads tab in the app to free up space

faqs.topic: When I try to play a video, I get an error, "The media could not be loaded"
faqs.description:
If you get this error, you can either:
  • Download the video and play it,
OR
  • If you do not see the download option, and if you have a SIM card from another network provider, switch to the other network and try again

faqs.topic: When I try to play a PDF, I get an error, "Missing PDF"
faqs.description:
If you get this error, you should:
  • Upgrade the app (if an update is available)
If you still face this issue after the upgrade, then
  • Delete the PDF if you've downloaded it
  • Check your internet connection and try playing the content again

faqs.topic: I cannot  see my board, medium, class and subject
faqs.description: Your State does not currently support all boards, mediums, classes and subjects. As soon as your State adds them, you will see it in the list.

faqs.topic: I am unable to see my profile settings
faqs.description: This is caused by an outdated version of Android System WebView component on your phone. To update the webview component: 1. Go to Google Playstore 2. Go to the android webview link. Use https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.webview Note: The Android WebView is a pre-installed component that allows Android apps to display web content. It should be kept up to date to ensure the latest security updates.

faqs.topic: I am logged in as a Teacher or Other. I want to change my role
faqs.description:
• Go to the Profile page
  • Click Edit below your role and location details
  • Modify your role
  • Note: If you to modify your role to Leader, select your sub-role and relevant location details
  • Click Submit

faqs.topic: I want to view the programs and resources for my role and location
faqs.description:
• Click Programs on home page
  • The list of programs for your role and location is displayed
  • Select a program to see all the resources for it
  • Click on the resource to use or start it

faqs.topic: My profile does not reflect my course progress correctly
faqs.description: To update your course progress in your profile, go to My learnings. Click on the Course. After the course opens, go to the kebab menu (three vertical dots on the right)> click Sync progress now. Wait for a few minutes. Your profile should now reflect your correct course progress

faqs.topic: I am unable to log in
faqs.description:
To use the {{APP_NAME}} mobile app, you must first register. You can register when you are connected to the Internet using any of these options:
  • Registered mobile number or email address
  • State provided ID
  • Existing Google(Gmail) ID
If you have already Signed Up, check if you have proper Internet connectivity.

faqs.topic: I want to create and add content on {{APP_NAME}}
faqs.description: Currently, the State appoints teachers to create and add content on {{APP_NAME}}. If you are interested in creating content,  send a request to your State authority to get creation rights

faqs.topic: I want to unenroll from a course
faqs.description: Select the course you want to unenroll from, tap the options menu (three vertical dots) on the top right corner and tap 'Unenroll'

faqs.topic: I want to know the status of my course completion
faqs.description: After you have successfully completed a course, the course name  will be displayed under the 'Trainings Attended' section in your profile page

faqs.topic: I have completed the training but my progress is not 100%.
faqs.description: DIKSHA marks training progress as 100% only after you view all the videos or read all the pdf documents completely. If you view a video partially or skip pages while reading a document, your progress is not marked as 100%.

faqs.topic: I am unable to download my course certificate
faqs.description: You may have an older version of the app. Go to Play store > DIKSHA. Click Update to get the latest version of the app. You should be able to download the certificate once you have successfully updated the app.

faqs.topic: I have completed my iGOT COVID training, but I have not received my certificate
faqs.description: Your COVID training completion certificate will be issued within 7 working days after you complete any COVID training. You will be informed by email or SMS when the certificate is issued. If you do not get your certificate within 7 working days, contact support@i-got.freshdesk.com.

faqs.topic: I want to download my iGOT COVID training completion certificate
faqs.description:
Your iGOT COVID training completion certificate will be issued within 7 working days after you complete any COVID training. You will be informed by email or SMS when the certificate is issued. After you receive the information, to download your certificate:
  • Go toProfile > Training attended
  • Click Download
  • The certificate is downloaded in the background
  • View and open it from your android file manager
If you do not get your certificate within 7 working days, contact support@i-got.freshdesk.com.

faqs.topic: I want to know if I have completed my training
faqs.description:
To know if you have completed the COVID training, check if:
  • Your training progress status is 100%
  • The training name appears under Profile > Training attended

faqs.topic: I want to edit the project details
faqs.description:
• 1. Open the project
  • 2. Click on the 3 dots in top right corner
  • Click Edit
  • Click on the Edit (pencil) icon to edit the details
  • Click Save Edits to save the changes

faqs.topic: I want to change the status of a task when no subtask is present
faqs.description:
• Open the project
  • Click on the task
  • Click on the dropdown below the task
  • Modify the status and click OK

faqs.topic: I want to change the status of a task when a subtask is present
faqs.description:
• Open the project
  • Click the required task
  • A list of subtasks is displayed
  • Click the subtask dropdown
  • Modify the status and click OK
  • Note: The task status is marked as complete automatically only if the status of all its subtasks are complete.

faqs.topic: I want to add an evidence file to the project after the task is complete
faqs.description:
• 1. Open Project
  • 2. Click on the completed task
  • 3. Click on Add attachment from the bottom right corner
  • 4. Click on Use camera to click a picture
  • 5. Click Load from library to select the image from your phone
  • 6. You will see the message Successfully attached in the pop up at top of your screen

faqs.topic: I want to add an evidence file for the Observation or Survey (Only when a question has the files option)
faqs.description:
• Start the observation/survey questionnaire
  • Click on the files option in the question
  • Select camera/upload image
  • An image icon is added to indicate evidence has been added.

faqs.topic: I want to access my Project reports on {{APP_NAME}}
faqs.description:
• Click Reports on home page
  • Select the resource type as Project
  • View the project, task and category overview report
  • Click on filter to select a particular program
  • Click ‘View report’ for detailed reports

faqs.topic: I want to access my Observation reports on  {{APP_NAME}}
faqs.description:
• Click Reports on the home page
  • Select the resource type as Observation
  • Select the observation form
  • Select the Entity
  • Click View Entity report

constants.knowMoreMsg: What more would you like to know?
constants.resolveMsg: Get help with finding content, technical issues and more. Browse through the topics to find FAQs, help videos and more.
constants.tellMoreMsg: Tell us more about the problem you faced
constants.thanksForFeedbackMsg: Thanks for your feedback. We may not be able to respond to every suggestion sent to us, but your feedback is valuable. It helps make {{app_name}} better for everyone.
constants.triggerEmailMsg: After you add details in the text box and tap the Initiate email button, we will trigger an email on your behalf. You can add further details and/or attach files there.
